basics.name: Victor Perin
basics.label: NodeJS Developer
basics.summary: I am a Computer Scientist working as Backend Developer. I love JavaScript, Linux, Open Source, Bash and creating twitter bots.

work.summary: At PrinciWeb I build Web Systems, Apps and Websites with tons of different tecnologies. (mostly, with NodeJS and C#)
highlights: Robo Tope - Our partly open source robot to automate jobs at the company
NFe - Um Gerador de Nota Fiscal Eletronica. Build with PHP and MySQL (100%, all backend).
Imuneasy - A web system for Immunization Clinics management. Build with NodeJS, CoffeeScript, Express, MsSql.
Stylist - Android app to share photos of fashion looks with friends. Builded with C#, WebApi, Entity Framework, Ionic.

work.summary: I was put in a project that an anterior company has left unfinished. I concluded the system by myself
highlights: In this project i figured out a product workflow product.
I also learned the basics of software architeture and how to scalate systems
Rebuilded from ground up by myself
Tecnologies used: PHP, HTML, JS, Jenkins, Linux, Git

languages.fluency: As duolingo says: 4.86 of 5.0 in their tests.
